objects.description: In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) utilized HMI GUIs in the SCADA environment to open breakers. (Citation: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems March 2016)
